member.name: T:LGP.ImageWindowsShellIcons.ShellIcon
member.summary: Retrievs shell info associated with a file or filetype
Get a 32x32 or 16x16 System.Drawing.Icon depending on which function you call either GetSmallIcon(string fileName) or GetLargeIcon(string fileName)

member.name: M:LGP.ImageWindowsShellIcons.ShellIcon.GetSmallIcon(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the small icon from the win32 api invocation
member.param: The file name to lookup ( extension )

member.name: M:LGP.ImageWindowsShellIcons.ShellIcon.GetLargeIcon(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the large icon from the win32 api invocation
member.param: The file name to lookup ( extension )

member.name: T:LGP.ImageWindowsShellIcons.ShellIcon.Shfileinfo
member.summary: Struct represting the information returned by the pinvoke

member.name: T:LGP.ImageWindowsShellIcons.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:LGP.ImageWindowsShellIcons.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:LGP.ImageWindowsShellIcons.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
